Articles.Content:
Hello, estemed Devs, Mods, and fellow flammable green explosive persons.

I discovered KSP about a month ago through a link on IGN, or was it Gamespy...don\'t recall.

Downloaded the demo...

Thank you for making this. Truly stimulating. I get to think, learn, blow up. Do again, because I can\'t stop now.

Put down the eminently reasonable $15. Tried a mod (MechJeb). Getting better.

My XBOX hates you. My Laptop is happy I\'m back. (PC\'eeee!) 

Program seems quite friendly to my 3yr old machine w/ no graphics card.

Looking forward to many journeys in the the Great Beyond! (KABOOOOOOM!!!)

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager

I begin to think that Capt. Skunky\'s response is robotic.

Here is a completely original and heartburned welcome!

Hello! Enjoy the explosions ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

-Arcane the Arcanist.
Welcome to the forums. And I don\'t think Capt. Skunky\'s posts are automated. There have been a few that managed to ninja him. However, that doesn\'t mean he isn\'t online 24/7

If his replys become boilerplate, to an extent, it\'s OK. Must mean there is a community growing. Must be a busy fellow. ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)
